errors.error_description: Invalid command syntax - lfs-admin and lfs commands don't exist for this package
correction_candidates: Replace with standard Django commands: django-admin startproject and python manage.py runserver
Use python setup.py install and python manage.py runserver instead
Change to pip install django-lfs and python -m django runserver
Replace with python -m lfs.manage setup and python -m lfs.manage runserver
errors.golden_answer: Replace with standard Django commands: django-admin startproject and python manage.py runserver
